items.title: Detections
items.description: - Detection rules that are missing `required_fields` will automatically have them set on platform startup, if they are not repository synchronized rules.

items.title: Case Tasks
items.description:
- When assigning a case task to a user, the change would not save
- When starting a case task, the owner would be overwritten by the individual starting the task.  This should only happen in the task is unassigned.
- Case Tasks could not be reassigned after starting, this is due to the same issue as the first item in this list.

items.title: Observable Popover
items.description: - The Copy Value button no longer worked when attemping to copy an observable value from the Observable Popover.
